Class Manager.AccountManager

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Manager.AccountManager
Enclosing class:
Manager
public static class Manager.AccountManager extends Object
The AccountManager class is responsible for managing user accounts in the system, which include teachers, students, and managers. It provides methods to add accounts, check for account existence, and retrieve specific account types by username.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountManager()
    Constructs an AccountManager instance, initializing the lists for all accounts, teachers, students, and managers.

    • account_exist

      public boolean account_exist(String user)
      Checks if an account with the specified username exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - the username to check for
      Returns:
      true if the account exists, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the Teacher account if found, null otherwise
